Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.player.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MatchListener, Damageable, java.util.EventListener
    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements Damageable, MatchListener
    This class represents the player entity, storing all info about its status during the match

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private CompoundAction activeAction
      This property stores the action that the player is currently doing, null if it is not doing anything
      private WeaponTile activeWeapon
      This property stores the weapon the player is currently using
      private java.util.List<AmmoCube> ammoCubes
      This property stores the ammoCubes owned by the player
      private PlayerConstraints constraints
      This property stores the constraints given to the player, such as how much damage can be received or how much AmmoCubes can be owned
      private Reward currentReward
      This property stores the reward that will be given to who kills or damages the player
      private java.util.List<DamageToken> damageTokens
      This property represents the damage received by the player during its current life
      private PlayerInfo info
      This property stores the basic player info
      private boolean isAlive
      This property represents the life status of the player
      private java.util.List<DamageToken> marks
      This property represents the marks received by the player during its current life
      private Match match
      This property stores the match the Player is participating to
      private java.util.Set<PlayerListener> playerListeners
      This property stores the listeners of the Player's events
      private int points
      This property stores the points earned by the player
      private java.util.List<PowerupTile> powerups
      This property stores the powerups owned by the player
      private int skulls
      This property stores the skulls owned by the player
      private java.util.List<WeaponTile> weapons
      This property stores the weapons owned by the player

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Player​(Match match, PlayerInfo info, PlayerConstraints constraints)
      This constructor creates a player from the basic info: the player will be empty and ready to start a new match

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player​(Match match,
              PlayerInfo info,
              PlayerConstraints constraints)
        This constructor creates a player from the basic info: the player will be empty and ready to start a new match
        Parameters:
        match - the match this new player belongs to
        info - a PlayerInfo object containing the basic info
        constraints - a PlayerConstraints object containing a set of rules regarding the health and the scoring

    • Method Detail

      • getDamageTokens

        public java.util.List<DamageToken> getDamageTokens()
        This method returns the damage tokens received so far by this Damageable
        Specified by:
        getDamageTokens in interface Damageable
        Returns:
        a list containing the DamageToken received so far, the list will be empty if there are none

      • addDamageTokens

        public void addDamageTokens​(java.util.List<DamageToken> newTokens)
        This method assigns damage tokens to a Player. It checks how much damage can still be added and notifies the listeners in case of death or overkill
        Specified by:
        addDamageTokens in interface Damageable
        Parameters:
        newTokens - a list of DamageToken that should be given to the Player

      • addDamageToken

        public void addDamageToken​(DamageToken damageToken)
        This method assigns a single damage token to a Damageable
        Specified by:
        addDamageToken in interface Damageable
        Parameters:
        damageToken - the DamageToken that should be given to the Damageable

      • getMarks

        public java.util.List<DamageToken> getMarks()
        This method returns the marks received so far by this player
        Returns:
        a list of DamageToken containing the marks received so far, the list will be empty if there are none

        public void setActiveAction​(CompoundAction activeAction)

        public void move​(Direction direction)

      • grabWeapon

        public void grabWeapon​(WeaponTile weapon,
                       java.util.List<AmmoCube> ammoCubes,
                       java.util.List<PowerupTile> powerups,
                       WeaponTile discardedWeapon)
        This method allows the player to buy a new weapon when he already has the maximum allowed, exchanging it for one of those he owns
        Parameters:
        weapon - the WeaponTile that the player is buying
        ammoCubes - the cost the player is paying with ammoCubes
        powerups - the cost the player is paying with powerups
        discardedWeapon - the WeaponTile the player is giving up for the new one

      • grabWeapon

        public void grabWeapon​(WeaponTile weapon,
                       java.util.List<Coin> coins,
                       WeaponTile discardedWeapon)
        This method allows the player to buy a new weapon when he already has the maximum allowed, exchanging it for one of those he owns
        Parameters:
        weapon - the WeaponTile that the player is buying
        coins - the list of Coins the player is using to pay
        discardedWeapon - the WeaponTile the player is giving up for the new one

      • grabWeapon

        public void grabWeapon​(WeaponTile weapon,
                       java.util.List<AmmoCube> ammoCubes,
                       java.util.List<PowerupTile> powerups)
        This method allows the player to buy a new weapon, given that he has less than the maximum weapons allowed
        Parameters:
        weapon - the WeaponTile that the player is buying
        ammoCubes - the cost the player is paying with ammoCubes
        powerups - the cost the player is paying with powerups

      • grabWeapon

                       java.util.List<Coin> coins)
        This method allows the player to buy a new weapon, given that he has less than the maximum weapons allowed
        Parameters:
        weapon - the WeaponTile that the player is buying
        coins - the list of Coins the player is using to pay

        Parameters:

      • reload

        public void reload​(WeaponTile weapon,
                   java.util.List<AmmoCube> ammoCubes,
                   java.util.List<PowerupTile> powerups)
        This method allows the player to reload a weapon it owns
        Parameters:
        weapon - the Weapon that shall be reloaded
        ammoCubes - the cost the player is paying with ammoCubes
        powerups - the cost the player is paying with powerups

      • reload

        public void reload​(WeaponTile weapon,
                   java.util.List<Coin> coins)
        This method allows the player to reload a weapon it owns
        Parameters:
        weapon - the Weapon that shall be reloaded
        coins - the cost the player is paying with ammoCubes and powerups

        public void onMatchModeChanged​(MatchModeChanged event)

        onMatchModeChanged in interface MatchListener
        Parameters:

      • pay

        private void pay​(java.util.List<AmmoCube> spentAmmoCubes,
                 java.util.List<PowerupTile> spentPowerups)
        This method handles payment given a list of ammo cubes and a list of powerups
        Parameters:
        spentAmmoCubes - the list of ammo cubes spent by the player
        spentPowerups - the list of powerups spent by the player

      • pay

        public void pay​(java.util.List<Coin> coins)
        This method supports a generic payment
        Parameters:
        coins - the list of coins used for the payment

      • getCurrentReward

        public Reward getCurrentReward()
        This method gets the current reward for damaging the player
        Returns:
        the current Reward

      • getAvailableMacroActions

        public ActionTile getAvailableMacroActions()
        This method determines the status of a player at a given time, based on: - player's health - current match mode - final frenzy turns Then the ActionTileFactory is called to return the correspondent set of macro actions
        Returns:
        the action tile representing the available macro actions the player can do

      • isAlive

        public boolean isAlive()
        This method gets the life status of the player
        Returns:
        true if player is currently alive, false if he is dead

      • bringBackToLife

        public void bringBackToLife()
        This method allows for a player to be brought back to life

        This method notifies all PlayerOverkilledListeners
        Parameters:
        killer - the killer that overkilled this player

      • notifyPlayerDied

        private void notifyPlayerDied​(Player killer)
        This method notifies all PlayerDiedListeners
        Parameters:
        killer - the killer that killed this player

      • notifyPlayerDamaged

        private void notifyPlayerDamaged​(Player attacker)
        This method notifies all PlayerDamagedListeners
        Parameters:
        attacker - the attacker that attacked this player
